hero.subtitle: ewerton is a software house focused on turning complex problems into elegant, reliable software. We design and build technology that helps people and businesses move faster, scale safely, and create real-world impact.

projects.title: What We're Building
projects.subtitle: These are the products we're actively building and evolving to solve real operational problems.

aiomover.title: aiomover
aiomover.description: The ultimate cloud migration tool for personal and business use. aiomover makes it simple to transfer files between cloud storage providers securely and efficiently. Whether you're backing up data, migrating to a new provider, or synchronizing across platforms, aiomover handles it all.

questao.title: questao
questao.tagline: Master national exams, one question at a time
questao.description: An AI-powered EdTech platform designed to help students prepare for the national exams. With years of real exam questions, gamified learning, live rankings, and personalized AI tutoring, questao makes studying engaging and effective.

about.title: About ewerton
about.description: Hi, I am Ewerton, a software engineer driven by curiosity, craftsmanship, and purpose. I love building elegant and reliable systems and genuinely enjoy turning complex problems into simple, scalable solutions. I am a wanderer in life, exploring places as contrasting as the warm Brazilian beaches and the snowy peaks of the Andes mountains. Guided by my faith in God, I strive to build technology responsibly and create tools that have a positive, lasting impact.

contact.title: Let's Connect
contact.subtitle: Interested in working together or just want to say hello? Feel free to reach out!
